title: Gas included, 24-Hour package lockers, Air conditioning
neighborhood: 5351 San Vicente Boulevard, Los Angeles, CA
posting_body: TWO MILES FROM THE HISTORIC GROVE AT FARMERS MARKET, THE MELROSE AVENUE SHOPPING DISTRICT, AND THE BEVERLY CENTER, LA'S PREMIER FOOD, FASHION, AND SHOPPING DESTINATION.
Your Villa Vicente key opens more than the door to your home.
Escape to a four-acre residential resort surrounded by the calming sounds of fountains and gentle streams.
Our community of apartment homes features well-appointed units in a beautiful tropical courtyard setting.
This gated community is professionally managed with excellent management and maintenance staff.
Ideally located near a plethora of shopping, dining and entertainment options, our Los Angeles rental homes offer air conditioning, mirrored closets, and balconies or patios in most units.
Visit our residential community and discover tranquil living and big city convenience.
- Minutes to The Original Farmer’s Market
- Walking Distance to Miracle Mile’s dinning and shops
- Minutes to Larchmont Village, The Grove, The Beverly Center and Melrose Avenue Dinning and Shopping
- Minutes to Wilshire La Brea Dog Relief Park and Hancock Park
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
